page.shortlink: gridproperties freeform edit regions right of grid property
page.description: You can enter any HTML to appear right of the Grid part of the component.

discussion.p: For a detailed explanation of freeform edit regions for the Grid Component, see the [Above Grid] property.

page.tip: You can use .a5w codeblocks to reference page and session variables in the freeform region.

link.link: grid properties freeform edit regions above grid
